name: Living Garden
description:
Mr. James, instructed us to look after his garden on the island. We need to look after the garden for 7 days and 7 nights.

But Mr. James did not warn us that this side is not an ordinary one...

========

Pick up item - E

Answer the phone - C

Interact with the plant - F or ENTER

========

Unfortunately, there are a lot of bugs in the game, because before the delivery of the project we encountered a major bug that broke everything. After the game jam, we will upload the fixed project.

The game is completely broken =(

We literally missed 1-2 hours
